comments.comment:
Isreal vala Uuran ge thel aragena eva policiyata pavicchi
karanna ema aanduven avasara ganimin sitinava thrasthavadeenta viruddava eva
paavichchi karanna. Isreal vala avasara illanne, isreal jaathiyath Uuran
athikaranneth naha, kanneth nathi nisa, egollath muslimla vagema, emanisa
egollange policiyata uuru thel paavichchi kerimta pera, egolla dan aanduwen
uttarayak enakal sitinawa. Sri lankavata ehema kisima prashnayak naha, mokada
ape rate kisima thahanamak naha UURA kanna baha kiyala, ho athikaranna baha
kiyala, emanisa apage aarakshavata min pasu api samoma, uuru thel langa
thiyagena imu. Uuru thel podi bothalyaka saakuwe ho hand bagaye thiyagath haka.
Ham, bacon, nathinam venakuth uurata ayath kaama gedara thiyagana inna
hadissiyakata, muslim kattiya kadu , pihi aragena avoth apiva maranna. maragena
marena evun visvasa karanava urange monava hari gavunoth evunta swargayata
yanne baha kiyala, apita kaduth naha poluth naha ape geval vala, ape
arakshavata hadisiyakata poilice, army kavuruth naha, emanisa UURU thel ho
UURAGE mas ho anikuth kotasak gedara thiyagena inna. Mun evata lang venne naha.
Eastern (Russian rataka ) UURU thel (seethala nisa lard butter vage)
christianunge gevalvala gate eke, doraval vala gala thibba kiyala kiyanava
egollange yudde kale muslim vs christians,


UURAGE oluwe photo ekakuth thamage gedara gattuwe gasanna puluwan, api mepamana kalayak
anikuth agam vala minisun gana hithala api eminisunta karadara novenna evagema
egollage agam valata garu karala jeevath vuna, namuth ada me muslim varun
anikuth agam gana kisima garuthvayak nathuwa egollan gana vitharak kathakaramin
anikuth agamvala minisun egollage haturo kiyagena api samatama hathurukam
karanna, maranna laasthi venava, ehema vitharak nova, me apage boomiye egollan
jeevth venne, namuth lankikayan vashayen egollanta hangeemak nathei kiyala
apita dan vatahila thiyanava, api kohomada idiriye hari egollava visvasa
karanne. Me gana apage deshapalakayan hodin daka ganna ona.
comments.author: Raj Warnakulasuriya
